subject: Basketball
Twins
lead_paragraph: In the first meeting of what could biannually cycle itself for the next decade or so, the twin 7-foot centers Brook and Robin Lopez, will be on opposing N.B.A. teams.
snippet: In the first meeting of what could biannually cycle itself for the next decade or so, the twin 7-foot centers Brook and Robin Lopez, will be on opposing N.B.A. teams.
